About me

Hello there. My name is Viscount Wathika and I'm a Ruby Developer living in Nairobi, Kenya. I'm a passionate GNU/Linux hacker and a hardcore Skateboarder. When I'm not busy coding, you'd find me mashing buttons on my PlayStation 3 playing my favourite games.

Apart from writing here, I do follow some popular tech writings on the web. These are some of my favourites.

  • Armin Ronacher's Thoughts and Writings
  • John Somnez's simpleprogrammer
  • Jeff Atwood's Coding Horror
  • Ian Bicking: A Blog

My setup

I currently use a Lenovo G50-80 (Intel Core i5, 8GB RAM) running Windows and Ubuntu which I use for all my computing needs. I use Vim, Atom, Emacs and AdobeBrackets for all the coding and editing purposes. And I coudn't live without my other Linux VM's running under VirtualBox and VMWare Fusion.

About this site

This site is generated by Voldemort, a blog-aware static site generator using Jinja2 and Markdown, written by me. Previously I was using the Rubish Jekyll for this site. But I developed Voldemort in python and it was fun building it. You could find the source code for this website on my GitHub repository. I use Minimal theme by orderedlist.
